channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What could a Trump recession look like? The economic outlook is bad — or worse.

item.title: Why Trump's tariffs won't push China and Europe closer
item.description: China and the European Union are unlikely to become close allies even as relations between the EU and the White House could sour.
